budu dahama parapuren parapurata gena yame aramunin yukthawa 2600 wani shri sambuddhathwa jayanthiya nimithi karagena, kolambaa thummulla mansandhiya aasannaye idi karana lada lowa wishalama bauddha prakashana ha thorathuru madhyasthanaya wiwrutha kirime punya mahothsawaya me masa 15 wanida(heta dina)janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage pradhanathwayen perawaru 8.30ta wiwrutha kere.nadimale bauddha sanskruthika madhyasthanaye adhyaksha pujya kirama wimalajothi swamin wahansege adahasak anuwa, janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathage mangapenwima yatathe bauddha sanskruthika madhyasthanaya mangin saha dhanapathiyange anugrahayen me mandiraya godanangana ladi.shri lankeya bauddha, abauddha saha anek ratawala wideshikayan wenuwen mewani madhyasthanayak aarambha kirime aramuna pahadili karamin kirama wimalajothi himiyo mese pawasuha.“awurudu 2300ka kalayak jiwitha parithyagayen me uthum dharmaya ha shasanaya aaraksha karagena pamini yathiwarunta gaurawaya dakwima sandahath dharmaye surakshithabhawa thahawuru kirima pinisath, nishchitha sthanayak godananga ema uthum dharmaya lokayata daka bala ganimata awakashaya salasima mewani deyak kirime aramunayi.2010 pebarawari masa 03 wana dina janadhipathithumange surathin mulgala thaba aarambha kala me mandiraya mahal 16 kin samanwithaya.
